overview:
London based technology entrepreneur. Former experience as a film and advertising Producer.

Successfully managed 3 successful start-up and exit cycles, using a combination of Angel and Private Equity capital. The most public of these was a disruptive technology for the UK postal market - ViaPost - which was founded by Ben Way and Charlie Lass in Jan 2007.

Nominated for a number of “Top 30 under 30” lists throughout the late 2000’s.

Joined Access Intelligence Plc in 2010 to overhaul an enterprise risk management system which later became the SaaS system ControlPoint.

ControlPoint was developed into a high-end suite of incident management and emergency response modules for Aviation, Finance and Oil & Gas. It was also used by the UK Foreign Office.

Charlie has overseen the rapid expansion of ControlPoint into a emergency response tracking system used by global organisations.
